_source.productDescription:
Rudimental, together with Untitled Group and NOVA Nation, have announced their eagerly awaited return to Australia in February 2025. The award-winning British trio is set to bring their new DJ-focused RUDIM3NTAL show to fans across Perth, Adelaide, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane and Sydney.

Hailing from East London, Rudimental - composed of Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden, and Leon "Locksmith" Rolle - have firmly cemented themselves as one of dance music’s most successful acts over the past decade. Following their previous performances across Sydney and Melbourne in January 2024, the trio will unveil RUDIM3NTAL - an exciting new show for their upcoming headline tour. Captivating and euphoric, RUDIM3NTAL sees the group behind the decks to encapsulate the remarkable energy from their early drum n bass DJ sets, creating an incredible atmosphere for fans.
_source.productShortDescription: Rudimental, together with Untitled Group and NOVA Nation, have announced their eagerly awaited return to Australia in February 2025.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeTypeIdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.
attributes.attributeIdDescription: An access and inclusion statement is available (make this available on your website).

accessibilityAttributes.attributeSubType1IdDescription: Actively welcomes people with access needs.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Offer multiple options for booking - web, email, phone
Offer a range of contact methods for receiving complaints
Accept the Companion Card
Employ people with disability
Train your staff in disability awareness
Provide assistance with booking arrangements (includes providing clear  itineraries with written instructions  on what to do at various destinations)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who use a wheelchair.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have step free outdoor pathways (includes picnic areas, barbecues and shelters)
Have a step free main entrance to the building and/or reception area (includes ramps or slopes with a maximum gradient of 1:14, otherwise are too steep for wheelchairs)
Have step free access to restaurant, lounge and bar
Have step free access to the conference or function room
Have accessible seating areas in theatrette
Have doorways which are easy to open and have lever handles (doorways 850mm or wider when open and not heavy)
Have an accessible public toilet which is unlocked
Have a wheelchair accessible toilet / shower and change room
Have wheelchair accessible picnic tables (picnic tables require 720mm knee clearance and 800mm maximum height)
Have a wheelchair/scooter charging station (power point) in an accessible location
Have at least one wheelchair accessible parking space with wheelchair accessible signage clearly displayed (International standards are 3200mm wide x 2500 mm high)

Have wheelchair accessible transport options available in the general vicinity (provide information on name of the operator, phone and website link to individual providers for private vehicles, community transport train, mini vans, hire cars, buses, taxis, ferry, tram, light rail etc in your access statement)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people with allergies and intolerances.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Modify your cooking and cleaning practices to cater for people with food allergies or chemical intolerances (could include menus with meals free from: nuts, dairy, seafood, eggs, gluten etc)
Train your staff to respond to allergic reactions
Adhere to The Food Authority requirements for allergy management in food preparation
Have equipment to respond to anaphylactic shock such as epi–pens and defibrillator

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Welcomes and assists people who have challenges with learning, communication, understanding and behaviour. (includes people with autism, intellectual disability, Down syndrome, acquired brain injury (ABI), dyslexia and dementia)

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Use Plain English / easy read signage and information (includes menus and emergency information)
A quiet space is available at the venue/ facility

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: Caters for people who are blind or have vision loss.

attributes.attributeIdDescription: Have  Braille and tactile signage on all information and paths of travel
Provide information in large print
Provide digital communication materials (hard copy information is also available on line)
Use easy read fonts in your signage and communication materials (Helvetica and Arial)
Have an appropriate area for toileting an assistance dog
Have handrails on all your stairways
Have Exit signs which are visible at a ground level (high level signs are difficult to see in a fire)

attributeBlocks.attributeSubType2IdDescription: An access and inclusion statement is available (make this available on your website).

productComments.commentText:
Rudimental, together with Untitled Group and NOVA Nation, have announced their eagerly awaited return to Australia in February 2025. The award-winning British trio is set to bring their new DJ-focused RUDIM3NTAL show to fans across Perth, Adelaide, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane and Sydney.

Hailing from East London, Rudimental - composed of Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden, and Leon "Locksmith" Rolle - have firmly cemented themselves as one of dance music’s most successful acts over the past decade. Following their previous performances across Sydney and Melbourne in January 2024, the trio will unveil RUDIM3NTAL - an exciting new show for their upcoming headline tour. Captivating and euphoric, RUDIM3NTAL sees the group behind the decks to encapsulate the remarkable energy from their early drum n bass DJ sets, creating an incredible atmosphere for fans.

Rudimental 與Untitled Group 和NOVA Nation 一起宣布將於2025 年2 月期待已久的回歸澳洲。他們以DJ 為主的全新RUDIM3NTAL 節目、布里斯班和雪梨。

來自東倫敦的 Rudimental 樂隊由 Piers Aggett、Kesi Dryden 和 Leon“Locksmith” Rolle 組成，在過去十年中牢牢鞏固了自己作為舞曲音樂最成功樂隊之一的地位。繼 2024 年 1 月在雪梨和墨爾本進行演出之後，三人組將推出 RUDIM3NTAL，這是他們即將舉行的頭條巡演的一場激動人心的新節目。 RUDIM3NTAL 迷人且令人愉悅，看到幕後團隊將他們早期的鼓與貝斯 DJ 組合中的非凡能量融入其中，為粉絲創造了令人難以置信的氛圍。

Rudimental, bersama dengan Untitled Group dan NOVA Nation, telah mengumumkan kembalinya mereka yang telah lama ditunggu-tunggu ke Australia pada bulan Februari 2025. Trio Inggris pemenang penghargaan ini akan membawakan pertunjukan RUDIM3NTAL baru mereka yang berfokus pada DJ kepada para penggemar di Perth, Adelaide, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane, dan Sydney.

Berasal dari London Timur, Rudimental - yang terdiri dari Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden, dan Leon "Locksmith" Rolle - telah mengukuhkan diri mereka sebagai salah satu artis musik dansa paling sukses selama dekade terakhir. Setelah penampilan mereka sebelumnya di Sydney dan Melbourne pada bulan Januari 2024, trio ini akan meluncurkan RUDIM3NTAL - pertunjukan baru yang menarik untuk tur utama mereka yang akan datang. Menawan dan penuh euforia, RUDIM3NTAL menampilkan grup ini di balik panggung untuk merangkum energi luar biasa dari set DJ drum n bass awal mereka, menciptakan suasana yang luar biasa bagi para penggemar.

Rudimental, junto con Untitled Group y NOVA Nation, han anunciado su esperado regreso a Australia en febrero de 2025. El galardonado trío británico llevará su nuevo espectáculo RUDIM3NTAL centrado en DJ a los fans de Perth, Adelaida, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane y Sídney.

Procedentes del este de Londres, Rudimental, compuesto por Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden y Leon "Locksmith" Rolle, se han consolidado firmemente como uno de los actos de música dance más exitosos de la última década. Tras sus actuaciones anteriores en Sídney y Melbourne en enero de 2024, el trío presentará RUDIM3NTAL, un nuevo y emocionante espectáculo para su próxima gira principal. Cautivador y eufórico, RUDIM3NTAL muestra al grupo detrás de los platos para encapsular la notable energía de sus primeros sets de DJ de drum n bass, creando una atmósfera increíble para los fans.

ルディメンタルは、アンタイトルド・グループおよびNOVAネイションとともに、2025年2月に待望のオーストラリア復帰を発表した。受賞歴のあるこのイギリスの3人組は、パース、アデレード、メルボルン、サンシャインコースト、ブリスベン、シドニーのファンに、DJに重点を置いた新しいRUDIM3NTALショーを披露する予定だ。

イーストロンドン出身のルディメンタルは、ピアーズ・アゲット、ケシ・ドライデン、レオン・「ロックスミス」・ロールで構成され、過去10年間でダンスミュージック界で最も成功したバンドの1つとしての地位を固めている。2024年1月にシドニーとメルボルンで行われた前回の公演に続き、この3人組は、今後のヘッドラインツアーでエキサイティングな新しいショー、RUDIM3NTALを発表する。魅惑的で陶酔的なRUDIM3NTALでは、グループがデッキの後ろに立ち、初期のドラムンベースのDJセットの驚くべきエネルギーを凝縮し、ファンに素晴らしい雰囲気を演出する。

Rudimental, insieme a Untitled Group e NOVA Nation, hanno annunciato il loro attesissimo ritorno in Australia a febbraio 2025. Il pluripremiato trio britannico è pronto a portare il suo nuovo spettacolo RUDIM3NTAL incentrato sui DJ ai fan di Perth, Adelaide, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane e Sydney.

Originari di East London, i Rudimental, composti da Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden e Leon "Locksmith" Rolle, si sono saldamente affermati come uno degli artisti di maggior successo della musica dance nell'ultimo decennio. Dopo le loro precedenti esibizioni a Sydney e Melbourne a gennaio 2024, il trio presenterà RUDIM3NTAL, un nuovo entusiasmante spettacolo per il loro prossimo tour da headliner. Accattivante ed euforico, RUDIM3NTAL vede il gruppo dietro i piatti per incapsulare la straordinaria energia dei loro primi DJ set drum n bass, creando un'atmosfera incredibile per i fan.

Rudimental 与 Untitled Group 和 NOVA Nation 宣布，他们将于 2025 年 2 月重返澳大利亚。这支屡获殊荣的英国三人组合将为珀斯、阿德莱德、墨尔本、阳光海岸、布里斯班和悉尼的粉丝带来以 DJ 为中心的全新 RUDIM3NTAL 表演。

Rudimental 来自伦敦东部，由 Piers Aggett、Kesi Dryden 和 Leon "Locksmith" Rolle 组成，在过去十年中，他们已成为舞蹈音乐界最成功的乐队之一。继 2024 年 1 月在悉尼和墨尔本的演出之后，这支三人组合将推出 RUDIM3NTAL，这是他们即将到来的巡演中一场激动人心的新表演。RUDIM3NTAL 令人着迷和欣喜，他们在唱机后面展现了他们早期鼓打贝斯 DJ 组合的非凡能量，为粉丝营造了令人难以置信的氛围。

Rudimental, en collaboration avec Untitled Group et NOVA Nation, a annoncé son retour tant attendu en Australie en février 2025. Le trio britannique primé s'apprête à présenter son nouveau spectacle RUDIM3NTAL axé sur les DJ aux fans de Perth, Adélaïde, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane et Sydney.

Originaire de l'est de Londres, Rudimental - composé de Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden et Leon "Locksmith" Rolle - s'est fermement imposé comme l'un des groupes les plus réussis de la musique dance au cours de la dernière décennie. Après leurs précédentes performances à Sydney et Melbourne en janvier 2024, le trio dévoilera RUDIM3NTAL - un nouveau spectacle passionnant pour sa prochaine tournée en tête d'affiche. Captivant et euphorique, RUDIM3NTAL voit le groupe derrière les platines pour encapsuler l'énergie remarquable de leurs premiers sets de DJ drum n bass, créant une atmosphère incroyable pour les fans.

Rudimental은 Untitled Group과 NOVA Nation과 함께 2025년 2월에 호주로의 복귀를 간절히 기다렸다고 발표했습니다. 수상 경력에 빛나는 이 영국 트리오는 Perth, Adelaide, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane, Sydney의 팬들에게 새로운 DJ 중심의 RUDIM3NTAL 쇼를 선보일 예정입니다.

동런던 출신인 Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden, Leon "Locksmith" Rolle로 구성된 Rudimental은 지난 10년 동안 댄스 음악계에서 가장 성공적인 공연 중 하나로 자리매김했습니다. 2024년 1월 시드니와 멜버른에서 이전에 공연한 후 이 트리오는 다가올 헤드라인 투어를 위한 흥미진진한 새로운 쇼인 RUDIM3NTAL을 공개합니다. 매혹적이고 황홀한 RUDIM3NTAL은 이 그룹이 데크 뒤에서 초기 드럼 앤 베이스 DJ 세트의 놀라운 에너지를 담아 팬들에게 놀라운 분위기를 조성합니다.

Rudimental, junto com Untitled Group e NOVA Nation, anunciaram seu aguardado retorno à Austrália em fevereiro de 2025. O premiado trio britânico está pronto para trazer seu novo show focado em DJ RUDIM3NTAL para fãs em Perth, Adelaide, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane e Sydney.

Vindos de East London, Rudimental - composto por Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden e Leon "Locksmith" Rolle - se consolidaram firmemente como um dos atos de dance music de maior sucesso na última década. Após suas apresentações anteriores em Sydney e Melbourne em janeiro de 2024, o trio revelará RUDIM3NTAL - um novo show emocionante para sua próxima turnê principal. Cativante e eufórico, RUDIM3NTAL vê o grupo atrás dos decks para encapsular a energia notável de seus primeiros sets de DJ drum n bass, criando uma atmosfera incrível para os fãs.

Rudimental hat zusammen mit Untitled Group und NOVA Nation seine mit Spannung erwartete Rückkehr nach Australien im Februar 2025 angekündigt. Das preisgekrönte britische Trio wird seine neue DJ-fokussierte RUDIM3NTAL-Show den Fans in Perth, Adelaide, Melbourne, Sunshine Coast, Brisbane und Sydney präsentieren.

Rudimental aus East London – bestehend aus Piers Aggett, Kesi Dryden und Leon „Locksmith“ Rolle – hat sich im letzten Jahrzehnt als einer der erfolgreichsten Acts der Dance-Musik etabliert. Nach ihren vorherigen Auftritten in Sydney und Melbourne im Januar 2024 wird das Trio RUDIM3NTAL enthüllen – eine aufregende neue Show für ihre bevorstehende Headliner-Tour. Fesselnd und euphorisch zeigt RUDIM3NTAL die Gruppe hinter den Decks, um die bemerkenswerte Energie ihrer frühen Drum-and-Bass-DJ-Sets einzufangen und eine unglaubliche Atmosphäre für die Fans zu schaffen.

_source.productName: Gary Puckett and The Union Gap
_source.productDescription:
Gary Puckett and The Union Gap are a band etched in rock ‘n’ roll history boasting six consecutive gold records in a career that started in 1968 and still remains very prominent to this day.

They continue to tour the world in a show that is loaded with hits including Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower and Over You.

Gary Puckett and The Union Gap maintain a busy touring schedule, constantly touring the United States and Europe in a show that is packed with rock ‘n’ roll energy and vocal excellence.

Gary’s velvet voice is complimented perfectly with the vocal harmony and musical perfection of The Union Gap in a show that delivers the raw sixties sound that can only be associated with live music at its best.
_source.productShortDescription: Gary Puckett and The Union Gap are a band etched in rock ‘n’ roll history boasting six consecutive gold records.

productComments.commentText:
Gary Puckett and The Union Gap are a band etched in rock ‘n’ roll history boasting six consecutive gold records in a career that started in 1968 and still remains very prominent to this day.

They continue to tour the world in a show that is loaded with hits including Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower and Over You.

Gary Puckett and The Union Gap maintain a busy touring schedule, constantly touring the United States and Europe in a show that is packed with rock ‘n’ roll energy and vocal excellence.

Gary’s velvet voice is complimented perfectly with the vocal harmony and musical perfection of The Union Gap in a show that delivers the raw sixties sound that can only be associated with live music at its best.

Gary Puckett dan The Union Gap adalah band yang terukir dalam sejarah rock ‘n’ roll dengan enam rekaman emas berturut-turut dalam karier yang dimulai pada tahun 1968 dan masih tetap sangat menonjol hingga hari ini.

Mereka terus melakukan tur dunia dalam pertunjukan yang sarat dengan hits termasuk Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower dan Over You.

Gary Puckett dan The Union Gap mempertahankan jadwal tur yang sibuk, terus-menerus melakukan tur di Amerika Serikat dan Eropa dalam pertunjukan yang penuh dengan energi rock ‘n’ roll dan keunggulan vokal.

Suara lembut Gary dilengkapi dengan harmoni vokal dan kesempurnaan musik The Union Gap dalam pertunjukan yang menghadirkan suara mentah tahun enam puluhan yang hanya dapat dikaitkan dengan musik live yang terbaik.

ゲイリー・パケットとユニオン・ギャップは、1968年に始まったキャリアで6回連続ゴールドレコードを獲得し、今日でも非常に目立つ存在であり、ロックンロールの歴史に刻まれたバンドです。

彼らは、Young Girl、Woman、Woman、Lady Willpower、Over Youなどのヒット曲を満載したショーで世界をツアーし続けています。

ゲイリー・パケットとユニオン・ギャップは忙しいツアースケジュールを維持しており、ロックンロールのエネルギーと優れたボーカルが詰まったショーで米国とヨーロッパを絶えずツアーしています。

ゲイリーのベルベットのような声は、ユニオン・ギャップのボーカルハーモニーと音楽の完璧さと完璧に調和し、ライブミュージックの最高の瞬間にしか結びつかない生々しい60年代のサウンドを届けます。

Gary Puckett e The Union Gap são uma banda gravada na história do rock ‘n’ roll, ostentando seis discos de ouro consecutivos em uma carreira que começou em 1968 e ainda permanece muito proeminente até hoje.

Eles continuam a fazer turnês pelo mundo em um show que é carregado de sucessos, incluindo Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower e Over You.

Gary Puckett e The Union Gap mantêm uma agenda de turnês ocupada, constantemente viajando pelos Estados Unidos e Europa em um show que é repleto de energia do rock ‘n’ roll e excelência vocal.

A voz aveludada de Gary é complementada perfeitamente com a harmonia vocal e a perfeição musical do The Union Gap em um show que oferece o som cru dos anos 60 que só pode ser associado à música ao vivo no seu melhor.

Gary Puckett e The Union Gap sono una band incisa nella storia del rock 'n' roll che vanta sei dischi d'oro consecutivi in una carriera iniziata nel 1968 e che rimane ancora oggi molto importante.

Continuano a fare tournée in tutto il mondo con uno spettacolo ricco di successi tra cui Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower e Over You.

Gary Puckett e The Union Gap mantengono un fitto programma di tournée, girando costantemente gli Stati Uniti e l'Europa in uno spettacolo ricco di energia rock 'n' roll ed eccellenza vocale.

La voce vellutata di Gary si sposa perfettamente con l'armonia vocale e la perfezione musicale di The Union Gap in uno spettacolo che offre il crudo sound degli anni Sessanta che può essere associato solo alla musica dal vivo al suo meglio.

加里·帕克特 (Gary Puckett) 和 The Union Gap 是一支在摇滚乐历史上留下浓墨重彩的乐队，他们的职业生涯始于 1968 年，曾连续六次获得金唱片，至今仍十分出色。

他们继续在世界各地巡演，演唱了包括《Young Girl》、《Woman》、《Woman》、《Lady Willpower》和《Over You》等热门歌曲。

加里·帕克特 (Gary Puckett) 和 The Union Gap 的巡演日程很繁忙，他们不断在美国和欧洲巡演，演唱充满摇滚能量和卓越歌声的歌曲。

加里天鹅绒般的嗓音与 The Union Gap 的和声和音乐完美融合，在这场演出中，他们呈现出的原始六十年代声音只有现场音乐才能达到最佳效果。

게리 퍼켓과 유니언 갭은 1968년에 시작하여 오늘날까지도 매우 두드러진 경력을 쌓은 6개의 연속 골드 레코드를 자랑하는 록앤롤 역사에 새겨진 밴드입니다.

그들은 Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower, Over You를 포함한 히트곡이 가득한 쇼에서 전 세계를 순회하고 있습니다.

게리 퍼켓과 유니언 갭은 바쁜 투어 일정을 유지하고 있으며 록앤롤 에너지와 뛰어난 보컬로 가득 찬 쇼에서 미국과 유럽을 끊임없이 순회합니다.

게리의 부드러운 목소리는 라이브 음악에서만 최상의 60년대 사운드를 전달하는 쇼에서 유니언 갭의 보컬 하모니와 음악적 완벽함과 완벽하게 어우러집니다.

Gary Puckett und The Union Gap sind eine Band, die in die Geschichte des Rock’n’Roll eingegangen ist und in ihrer Karriere, die 1968 begann und bis heute anhält, sechs aufeinanderfolgende Goldene Schallplatten vorweisen kann.

Sie touren weiterhin um die Welt mit einer Show voller Hits wie Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower und Over You.

Gary Puckett und The Union Gap haben einen vollen Tourplan und touren ständig durch die Vereinigten Staaten und Europa mit einer Show voller Rock’n’Roll-Energie und stimmlicher Exzellenz.

Garys samtige Stimme wird perfekt ergänzt durch die Stimmharmonie und musikalische Perfektion von The Union Gap in einer Show, die den rauen Sound der Sechziger liefert, den man nur mit Live-Musik vom Feinsten verbinden kann.

Gary Puckett and The Union Gap es una banda grabada en la historia del rock and roll que cuenta con seis discos de oro consecutivos en una carrera que comenzó en 1968 y que sigue siendo muy destacada hasta el día de hoy.

Siguen de gira por todo el mundo en un espectáculo repleto de éxitos como Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower y Over You.

Gary Puckett and The Union Gap mantienen una apretada agenda de giras, recorriendo constantemente los Estados Unidos y Europa en un espectáculo repleto de energía rock and roll y excelencia vocal.

La voz aterciopelada de Gary se complementa perfectamente con la armonía vocal y la perfección musical de The Union Gap en un espectáculo que ofrece el sonido crudo de los años sesenta que solo se puede asociar con la música en vivo en su máxima expresión.

Gary Puckett 和 The Union Gap 是一支銘刻在搖滾樂歷史上的樂隊，自 1968 年開始其職業生涯以來，曾連續六次獲得金唱片，至今仍然非常出色。

他們繼續在世界各地巡演，演出了《Young Girl》、《Woman》、《Woman》、《Lady Willpower》和《Over You》等熱門歌曲。

Gary Puckett 和 The Union Gap 保持著繁忙的巡演日程，並不斷在美國和歐洲巡演，演出充滿搖滾能量和卓越的聲音。

Gary 天鵝絨般的嗓音與 The Union Gap 的聲音和諧和音樂完美相得益彰，在這場演出中呈現出只有現場音樂才能呈現的原始六十年代聲音。

Gary Puckett et The Union Gap sont un groupe qui a marqué l'histoire du rock'n'roll avec six disques d'or consécutifs au cours d'une carrière qui a débuté en 1968 et qui reste très en vue aujourd'hui.

Ils continuent de faire le tour du monde avec un spectacle rempli de tubes comme Young Girl, Woman, Woman, Lady Willpower et Over You.

Gary Puckett et The Union Gap ont un programme de tournée chargé, parcourant constamment les États-Unis et l'Europe avec un spectacle rempli d'énergie rock'n'roll et d'excellence vocale.

La voix de velours de Gary est parfaitement complétée par l'harmonie vocale et la perfection musicale de The Union Gap dans un spectacle qui délivre le son brut des années 60 qui ne peut être associé qu'à la musique live à son meilleur.
